Skills

Presentations

PHUSE SDE 2023

Clinical Visual Analytics for Review and Submission (CVARS) With Smriti Anand

An open-source tool and package to enable generation of common analysis reports (tables and interactive plots) for clinical review and direct inclusion in submission for regulatory agencies. This includes a Shiny application for complete safety report generation from Analysis Model (ADaM) datasets.

Slides available at https://phuse.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/Archive/2023/SDE/APAC/Chennai/PRE_Chennai02.pdf

DIA 2020

Utilizing a Bayesian Hierarchical Model to Design Quality Into a Clinical Trial and Allow Compliance with ICH E6 R2 Quality Tolerance Limits With Chris Wells

The objective of this work is to introduce the concept and implementation of the use of Bayesian Hierarchical Modeling to Quality Tolerance Limits as mandated by ICHE6 R2

Abstract available at https://www.diaglobal.org/en/flagship/dia-2020/program/about-our-offerings/posters/Poster-Presentations/Poster-Presentations-Details?ParentProductID=8258687&ProductID=8793367&AbstractID=90694
